name: hepplerj.github.io
body: I am a librarian and historian with interests in various forms of technology and a love of coffee. I am interested in the future of academic publishing, models of scholarly communication, and digital humanities. I began my career at Stanford University but currently serve as the Digital Engagement Librarian at the University of Nebraska at Omaha.
note: Don't delete this! It's used to help with page regeneration.
